name: 21st Century Women’s Entrepreneurship & Leadership Annual Conference
content: With the great success of the previous conferences Excel conferences announcing Women's Entrepreneurship and Leadership, which is going to be held in Madrid during April 21 to 22 2023 From Decades gender equality initiated across the globe, however, still in few continents still issues are there related to pay scale and leadership roles, which impacts their performance and their opportunity to advance in more than 100+ fields. Thus WEL2023 was established to harness the networking opportunities for Women’s in various fields across the 190+ countries. Latest Research suggested that attending conferences like WEL2023 almost doubled the working efficiency of women employees and thus, creating opportunities for promotions at the workplace and to establish their career as entrepreneurs, business owners, and leaders in the business development domain. # WEL2023 : Empowers women across the world by equipping them with opportunities that empower them, boost confidence and tools to enhance their career and make an influence on the industry. #WEL2023: A life-changing conference for Women Engineers, it aims at enhancing the proficiency and connections of women in technology. # WEL2023: Designed for encouraging, networking, and instructing women in Tech, which is definitely a golden opportunity for tech industry women as it’s a dynamic assembly of chance for connecting instructional sessions, and industrial leaders. # WEL2023: Gathering leaders from across the globe for considering the pressing issues prevailing across the world. MAJOR SESSIONS • Leadership and governance • Principles of a High-Reliability Organization (HRO) in healthcare • Quality management system | Sales process engineering • Social Entrepreneurship | Developing a business plan • Hiring Human Resources | Acquiring financial and material resources | Providing leadership • Being responsible for both the venture's success or failure • Risk aversion | Political Entrepreneurship • Knowledge Entrepreneurship | Relationship between small business and entrepreneurship Biosphere entrepreneurship • Innovation of new products, services or processes • Listen to customer feedback and adapt • Continuous process improvement (CPI) • Exploration of new business models • Finding solutions for problems • Use of technology | Use of business intelligence • Use of economical strategies | Development of future products and services | Optimized talent management • Entrepreneurial marketing strategies for interactive and innovative networking | Transformational leadership
